Text: Stop the bleeding Cc in a respected CEO from OUTSIDE the company Do SOMETHING All you need is one or two days of positive news something ANYTHING to stop the freefall and get analysts to reassess the stock and see it for the bargain it is But then again why listen to me If I was so smart I WOULDNT STILL BE HOLDING THE ENRON STOCK I BOUGHT IN AUGUST Sincerely A Shareholder David Groves
